Text.Page:
These undying creatures threaten the balance of the Ethereal Forest. The {@LinkCreature:26#2001#revivified cromoses}, {@LinkCreature:26#2002#revivified noruks}, {@LinkCreature:26#2003#resurgent ghilliedhus}, and the {@LinkCreature:26#1003#ebon weavers} are the worst. I need their numbers thinned out.

Report to Nileen when your mission is complete.
We are pleased with your performance. The balance is preserved.

This is an on-going battle, <PCNAME>. Until told otherwise, assume I will always reward you for killing {@LinkCreature:26#2001#revivified cromoses}, {@LinkCreature:26#2002#revivified noruks}, {@LinkCreature:26#2003#resurgent ghilliedhus}, and the {@LinkCreature:26#1003#ebon weavers}.
